public_speech: To ask the Secretary of State for Work and Pensions, how many applications for Care's Allowance have been processed by her Department in each month since 1 November 2023; and how many and what proportion of those applications took (a) between six and nine

relevance_summary.summary: The public speech or question addressed the processing of Carer's Allowance applications by the Department for Work and Pensions. Two reasons for relevance were flagged: 1) The individual holds an honorary, unremunerated position as Vice President of Carers UK, an organization advocating for carers, making Carer's Allowance processing relevant to their advocacy and interests. 2) They are also an unpaid director of The Fife Carers Centre, which supports carers, further linking their external role to the subject of the question.
